name: Madness Malady
desc: When an ally target is hit with an attack or consumes HP while their HP percentage is less than 40%, consumes 5 stack(s) of "Obsession" from the target with the highest "Obsession" stacks in the team, heals for 25% of this unit's Max HP, and increases DMG dealt by 150% for 2 turn(s). This effect can only be triggered 1 time(s) per turn.
